title: Response to Fr. Emmanuel’s love for “Sinhalese Buddhists”!
content: By Shenali Waduge Interview with Fr. Emmanuel by Sri Lankan Guardian/Nov 2012 The man who rechristened Prabakaran “anna” as “Jesus Christ”, the LTTE as “soldiers of Christ” and LTTE suicide bombers as “martyrs” is none other than President of the Global Tamil Forum – Father S J Emmanuel now self-exiled in Germany and not the…
